title: Tour de France stage 20: Pogačar scores redemptive victory, Pinot lights up swansong mountain stage
content:
Vingegaard finishes safe in third to all-but guarantee final victory, Pinot animates explosive 'home' stage through the Vosges.

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 20: Pogačar scores redemptive victory, Pinot lights up swansong mountain stage on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
